abusefilter-edit-builder-vars-sfs-blocke: Si le adresse IP es blocate usante le lista de stopforumspam.com
action-sfsblock-bypass: contornar le restrictiones de adresses IP emittite per le extension StopForumSpam
right-sfsblock-bypass: Contornar le restrictiones de adresses IP emittite per le extension StopForumSpam
stopforumspam-blocked: Le modification desde tu adresse IP ($1) ha essite restringite perque illo ha recentemente essite usate pro inviar spam a sitos web.
stopforumspam-is-blocked: Le adresse IP $1 ha essite restringite per causa de invio de spam. Pro plus information, tu pote cliccar sur le sequente ligamine externe: [https://stopforumspam.com/ipcheck/$1 $1]. Faciente isto, tu quitara {{SITENAME}} pro visitar stopforumspam.com, que pote reciper datos de tu apparato. Per favor examina lor [https://www.stopforumspam.com/privacy politica de confidentialitate], [https://www.stopforumspam.com/gdpr declaration RGPD] e [https://www.stopforumspam.com/legal conditiones de uso].
